title.rendered: TTE partners with Diehl Metering for Advanced Metering Solutions

content.rendered: Annette Geuther, Chief Sales Officer, Diehl Metering along with Jairo Rojas, Vice President Sales – MEA & Turkey and Maya Ayoub, Regional Sales & Business Development Manager, recently met with Easa Al Gurg, the ESAG GCEO, Dilip Sharma, ECIG Executive VP and Syed Raza, Senior Sales Manager – Products & Solutions, at the TTE corporate office to discuss the developing partnership, key projects and future developments. The collaboration enables the inclusion of advanced smart metering solutions as well as intelligent Advanced Metering Infrastructure (AMI) to the product portfolio. A complete smart metering solution that requires no manual intervention, AMI ensures seamless communication of meter readings, billings, and system detections (leaks and alarms), which allows operators/consumers to take the necessary corrective actions and measures.
